subject: Tennis
Australian Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Wawrinka continued the best stretch of his career with a four-set victory over Tomas Berdych, setting up a possible final against his Swiss countryman Roger Federer.
snippet: Wawrinka continued the best stretch of his career with a four-set victory over Tomas Berdych, setting up a possible final against his Swiss countryman Roger Federer.
